body.name: BLACK+DECKER 12-Cup Digital Coffee Maker, CM1160B, Programmable, Washable Basket Filter, Sneak-A-Cup, Auto Brew, Water Window, Keep Hot Plate, Black
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: QuickTouch Programming - Easily program the 24-hour auto brew feature so you can wake up to a fresh pot of coffee.
Digital Controls with Rubberized Feel - Large, rubberized buttons give you full control of the coffeemaker, and the easy-read screen displays the clock, brew time, and programming options.
Sneak-a-Cup - This feature temporarily stops the flow of coffee so you can pour your first cup before brewing ends without making a mess.
2-Hour Auto Shutoff - For added safety and peace of mind with every use.
Easy-View Water Window - The front-facing window shows you the exact amount of water that will turn into coffee.
body.description: Brew your daily coffee fast with the BLACK+DECKER™ 12-Cup* Programmable Coffeemaker. QuickTouch™ Programming buttons make it easy to set the 24-hour auto brew feature and shave some time off of your morning routine. Other useful features include Sneak-A-Cup™ Technology, the 12-cup* Duralife™ glass carafe, and a washable brew basket. *Cup equals approximately 5 ounces (varies by brewing technique) Black+Decker and the Black+Decker logo are trademarks of The Black & Decker Corporation and are used under license.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Black+Decker CM1160B 12-Cup Programmable Coffee Maker, Black/Stainless Steel Brew your daily coffee fast with the BLACK+DECKER 12-Cup Programmable Coffeemaker. QuickTouch Programming buttons make it easy to set the 24-hour auto brew feature and shave some time off of your morning routine. Other useful features include Sneak-A-Cup Technology, the 12-cup Duralife glass carafe, and a washable brew basket.

Digital Controls with Rubberized Feel Large, rubberized buttons give you full control of the coffeemaker, and the easy-read screen displays the clock, brew time, and programming options. Sneak-a-Cup This feature temporarily stops the flow of coffee so you can pour your first cup before brewing ends without making a mess. 2-Hour Auto Shutoff For added safety and peace of mind with every use. Easy-View Water Window The front-facing window shows you the exact amount of water that will turn into coffee.
QuickTouch Programming Easily program the 24-hour auto brew feature so you can wake up to a fresh pot of coffee.

Programmable Clock The digital clock includes a 24-hour programmable timer that can make a fresh cup whenever you need it. Removable Brew Basket Cleanup is easy with the dishwasher-safe brew basket, which is compatible with basket-style paper filters. Duralife Glass Carafe The sturdy 12-cup* carafe has measurement markings for accurate filling and an easy-grip handle for comfortable pouring. *Cup equals approximately 5 ounces (varies by brewing technique) Programmable Clock Removable Brew Basket Duralife Glass Carafe

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Steaming Cup of Satisfaction
reviews.reviewText: Rating: ★★★★★ (5/5)A reliable coffee maker can be the cornerstone of your daily routine, and the coffee maker I recently acquired has proven to be a true gem. It offers fantastic value for money, and I'm delighted with my purchase. Here's why:Affordable Excellence: ★★★★★ (5/5)One of the standout features of this coffee maker is its affordability without compromising on quality. It offers all the essential features you'd expect from a higher-priced machine without breaking the bank. It's a fantastic value proposition for coffee lovers on a budget.Simple & User-Friendly: ★★★★★ (5/5)Using this coffee maker is a breeze. Its straightforward design and intuitive controls make it accessible to anyone, whether you're a seasoned coffee enthusiast or a beginner. Just add your coffee grounds, water, and press a button to enjoy a steaming cup of java.Consistent Brewing: ★★★★★ (5/5)Consistency in coffee brewing is crucial, and this coffee maker excels in this aspect. It consistently delivers a well-brewed cup of coffee with the right balance of flavor and aroma. You can count on it to satisfy your caffeine cravings every morning.Compact & Space-Saving: ★★★★★ (5/5)The coffee maker's compact size makes it an ideal choice for those with limited counter space. It doesn't hog valuable real estate in the kitchen while still providing the convenience of a coffee shop-quality brew.Efficient & Quick: ★★★★★ (5/5)This coffee maker doesn't waste time. It brews your coffee quickly and efficiently, ensuring you get your caffeine fix without unnecessary delays. It's a time-saving companion for busy mornings.Easy Maintenance: ★★★★★ (5/5)Keeping this coffee maker clean is a straightforward task. The removable parts are easy to wash, and the machine doesn't require complex maintenance routines. It's a low-maintenance addition to your kitchen.Value for Money: ★★★★★ (5/5)Considering its affordability, simplicity, consistent brewing, compact design, and efficiency, this coffee maker offers excellent value for money. It provides the satisfaction of a well-brewed cup of coffee without the premium price tag.In summary, the coffee maker has brought joy to my mornings without breaking the bank. Its affordability, ease of use, and reliable performance make it a standout choice for coffee lovers who appreciate a good brew without the fuss. If you're seeking a cost-effective coffee maker that delivers consistently, this one is certainly worth considering. It's a wise investment in your daily dose of happiness.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works Well as Advertised
reviews.reviewText: This was a great buy for an extremely casual coffee drinker whose usage can be described as 2-3 a month at most. The machine is a decent size, taking up less space than the old one. It’s easy to use and clean. I don’t use the clock or the programmable features as it’s unnecessary for me. Based on my usage, I expect it to last a very long time. It was good but and recommended.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice coffee pot
reviews.reviewText: Bought from Amazon warehouse. Item looked like new but had one broken plastic foot which made coffee pot wobble. Quick fix with a stick on rubber foot and all is great and a great price as well

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars It works, and that's what counts
reviews.reviewText: I agree that for the price, this coffee maker is fine. That said, I bought it to replace an old Black & Decker that I've had for many years, and I don't like the new one as much, primarily because the filter basket does not sit flat on the counter, so when I fill it with coffee, I must bring the coffee to the machine and fill it there. Not a big deal, but also, the lid sticks, so requires 2 hands for me to open it. It's also noisier than my old one. Wish they had just stuck with their original design, although I do like that this one is shorter than the older version.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The coffee maker was quick and easy to assemble. Worked great from the first pot of coffee. Now prefer to coffee makers using pods as you can just pour a cup and no waiting time. It seems to be less expensive per cup of coffee.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works great does not beep
reviews.reviewText: This is the perfect coffee maker for the price. I can easily program it to automatically brew in the morning and it doesn’t beep which is exactly what I wanted!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Enamel wears off the heating unit
reviews.reviewText: I bought one of these in July and it is great, no problems. I bought another in November and the enamel on the heating unit was wearing off within a month. I returned it for a replacement, and the seller was very good about that. I received the replacement in December and the enamel on the heating unit is wearing off even worse than the prior one. It's too much bother to return it at this point, especially since I did not keep the packaging. I'll just be looking for another brand. I don't understand why the quality has gotten worse since July. It's a shame because otherwise it's a great coffee maker, fits my needs and makes a good tasting cup of coffee. If you do buy this one, I'd caution you to keep the packaging in case you need to return it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Simple to use!!
reviews.reviewText: You can not go wrong with this for your coffee making needs! We needed to have a second one (for another our cabin). Was SO HAPPY they still make this basic coffee maker Needed a second one for a cabin. VERY SIMPLE TO USE !! You will not be sorry with this one if you need a long lasting nice simple coffee maker!! Promise

Es una excelente cafetera por el precio, el sabor es muy intenso (a gusto personal es algo muy bueno), es muy sencilla de usar y el encendido automático es muy fácil de usar.La apariencia es muy moderna, compraría otra sin pensarlo!
Does a fabulous job making coffee, Day in day out.Looks great. It’s also easy to clean. Great product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on August 27, 2021
reviews.reviewText: Sellers were very good but unfortunately it’s a 110 v coffee machine

reviews.reviewTitle: sorry very dissappointing experience, when it was switched on ...
reviews.reviewText: sorry very dissappointing experience, when it was switched on we were able to see the displayes , but the hot plat was not worhing.
The hot plate keeps the coffee hot. Nice size for counter. Good brewing flavour.
